B: Issued by the Natural Hazards Early Warning Centre
Issued at 04.00 p.m. 20 December 2024 for the period until 04.00 p.m. 21 December 2024

WW/TC/24/12/20/01 ulletin No: 06: For Multiday boats in the West-central Bay of Bengal Sea areas
he low-pressure area over the southwest Bay of Bengal has now moved into the west-central

B: Bay of Bengal. It is expected to gradually move north-northeastwards.

WW/TC/24/12/20/01 ulletin No: 06:
• 
Sea areas in the West-central Bay of Bengal will be rough at times as the wind speed can
be increased up to (50 -60) kmph at times. Showers or thundershowers are likely in these

B: Action suggested for the Sea area:

WW/TC/24/12/20/01 ulletin No: 06: Naval  and  fishing  communities,  engaging  activities  over  West-central  Bay  of  Bengal  are
requested to be vigilant in this regard.
